cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)
set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE on)

add_compile_options(
        -fexceptions
        -frtti
        -std=c++20
        -Wall
        -Wpedantic
        -DLOG_TAG=\"Fabric\")

file(GLOB rrc_text_SRC CONFIGURE_DEPENDS *.cpp)

add_library(rrc_text OBJECT ${rrc_text_SRC})
=======

        folly_runtime
        glog_init
        jsi
